mapper.insert: insert into qna(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})

sql.if: where title like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' or writer in ( select id from member where name like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' )
where writer in ( select id from member where name like '%'|| #{keyword} || '%' )

mapper.select: select rownum no, n.*, (select name from member m where m.id=n.writer) name from (select * from qna order by id) n order by no desc
